bibl.title: Rent or Tax Receipt from Maoza.
bibl.note: P. Hever (previously known as P. Se'elim Gr. 5). From the cave in Nahal Hever, 29 January 125 CE. "We have another woman's archive from Nahal Hever, that of Salomê Komaisê daughter of Levi, who like Babatha left her precious documents behind."
COTTON Hannah M., Rent or Tax Receipt from Maoza.
ZPE 100 (1994) pp. 547-557 et pl. XXXII c.
